text: Þis synt þa landgemæro to wicham.
Ærest se burna on easthealfe on suþhealfe sanctæ Agustines gemæro & eft sanctæ Agustines land on westhealfe be þælbrycge.
Swa forþ andlang broces oþ hose graf & þær west be mearcfleote to sture & swa east be sture oþ burnan muþan & swa forþ oþ Eadulfes mearce & þær forþ be broce oþ ealdan stræt & se wuda on trindlea.
& þæt den on blean earnes hyrst on easthealfe þeningden & seo burhstræt on suþhealfe Ælfrices mearc on westhealfe.
Cluse & hamingford on norðhealfe þæs hiredes mearc to Sancte Mildryþe swa forð oþ langan leagas swa oþ Ælfweardes mearce.
